The thermonuclear smoke devil, often referred to as Thermy, is the boss version of the smoke devil, found in the Smoke Devil Dungeon. It requires a minimum of 93 Slayer to damage. Located at the Smoke Devil Dungeon south of Castle Wars, the Thermonuclear smoke devil can only be attacked on a smoke devil task, with the exception of one kill for the Western Provinces Diary (provided that the player has 93 Slayer without boosting).

It is the only monster to drop the Smoke battlestaff, Jar of smoke and the pet smoke devil. It drops the occult necklace at a higher rate than smoke devils do.

Unlike most NPCs, the Thermonuclear smoke devil is always able to walk through other monsters/players. This is to prevent players from safespotting the boss using the smoke devils found in its lair.

A dwarf multicannon cannot be used inside the boss room. If it is set up, the cannon will be destroyed (as in the lairs of the KBD and KQ).

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 1,059,303 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Thermonuclear smoke devil kill is worth 24,555.43.

The average Thermonuclear smoke devil kill while on a Konar task is worth 26,967.86.

Combat Achievements[edit | edit source]

The following Combat Achievement tasks involve the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil.

Name Description Difficulty Category
Thermonuclear Veteran Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil 20 times. Elite Kill count
Hazard Prevention Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil without it hitting anyone. Elite Perfection
Spec'd Out Kill the Thermonuclear Smoke Devil using only special attacks. Elite Restriction

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 March 2021
(update | poll)
  • Added the Jar of Smoke to the tertiary drop table
  • Reduced the chance of dropping Tinderboxes, Bullseye Lanterns, Pure Essence and Kebabs.
25 June 2015
(update | poll)

Added a 'peek' option to the entrance of this boss, allowing players to see the number of other players currently in the boss room.

19 March 2015
(update)

You can no longer kill Thermy without a slayer assignment if you haven't started the Western Achievement Diary.

17 July 2014
(update | poll)

Players can now receive a pet version of this boss after defeating it.

22 May 2014
(update)
  • When Thermy drops a clue scroll, it now appears at the correct place on the ground.
  • Thermy and the Cave kraken boss now have 'Attack' options, rather than 'Fight'.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

A player transformed into a Thermy snowman.
  • The thermonuclear smoke devil was graphically updated on 27 September 2018 as part of an update. Prior to the update, it was simply a larger version of the smoke devils scattered across the dungeon.
  • The thermonuclear smoke devil and the Kraken are the only slayer bosses that can be fought with another player.
  • Despite the magic defence bonus of +800, at level one the effective defence against magical attacks is equal to 13.5 magic levels due to the way magic defence rolls are calculated.
  • Attempting to attack the thermonuclear smoke devil with a boosted Slayer level of at least 93 will yield the message: Although Brieve will allow you to kill this boss off-task for the Achievement Diary, the level 93 requirement still applies. Stat-boosts are not accepted.
  • Players can transform into a Thermy snowman by using a snowman ring, which resembles the thermonuclear smoke devil.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 Envision. "Drop Rates V2." Old School RuneScape Forums.

  3. ^ Jagex. The Kebos Lowlands. 10 Jan 2019. (Archived from the original on 15 Mar 2019.)*
  4. ^ Jagex. Mod JohnC's Twitter account. 15 September 2014. (Archived from the original on 15 September 2014.) Mod JohnC: "Kraken, Thermy & Penance Queen pet drop rates - DKS for the final reveal next week!"
